pages.title: The Warped Mosco
pages.text: Though blind to anything not emitting light, the Hullbreaker has earned its violent name and equally violent appearance. You'll find it in the Abyssal Chasm. I suggest not trying its might unless you're ready.$(br)To obtain the Heart Container, you'll need to slay all of:$(li)The Warped Mosco$(li)The Hullbreaker
